lead_paragraph: The Jets signed five free agents, including Jesse Pellot-Rosa, a former basketball player at Virginia Commonwealth. The Jets also signed defensive back James Ihedigbo, cornerback Rayshaun Kizer, linebacker Jared Newberry and wide receiver Renard Stevens. All five players received tryouts at rookie minicamp last weekend.Pellot-Rosa, who tried out at wide receiver, helped lead the Rams to a Colonial Athletic Association title and a first-round upset of Duke in the N.C.A.A. tournament in March.
